sentences: PANEKS PANEKS PANEB - EESTI KUI TEKSTISÕNASTAMISE KORDUS ÕPPEAINENA
context: The word 'paneb' is the 3rd person singular present tense form of the Estonian verb 'panema'. It means 'to put', 'to place', or 'to set' something somewhere. This verb is commonly used when describing someone's action of putting objects in specific locations or arranging things.
